sentence: I pulled my cows udder, but nothing came out. hes a milk dud.
explanation: a thing that fails to work properly
first_new_sentence: The plan was a dud and did not succeed.
second_new_sentence: After his bad performance, he was considered a dud in the play.

sentence: What do you call a tissue that is sleeping? a napkin
first_new_sentence: I took a quick nap on the couch after lunch.
second_new_sentence: The loud music woke him from his nap.

sentence: Whats the best way to get bubble gum out of your hair? cancer
explanation: a disease wherein cells divide uncontrollably
first_new_sentence: Her aunt fought a brave battle against cancer for many years.
second_new_sentence: The warning labels about cancer on cigarettes are meant to inform the public.

sentence: These jokes utilize words that share two different meanings but are spelled the same way. The serious sentences are crafted to reflect each meaning of the selected words.
